source: Sports Betting Syndicate Tactics (Safest Betting Sites, Sports Trade)
title: Buy-Back Trap / Late Reversal Signal
mechanism: Sharp syndicates sometimes place early bets to move the line, then 'buy back' with larger bets on the opposite side at better prices. In Kalshi, if early trades favor YES but late trades favor NO with larger size, the late reversal may be the 'real' bet.

proposed_signal.condition: First half of trades favor side A, second half favors side B with larger average size
proposed_signal.expected_edge: +5-10% if late reversals are intentional sharp plays

price_proxy_risk: LOW - measures temporal reversal pattern, not price
novelty_vs_tested: H115 tested 'commitment reversal' by same-size trades. This tests temporal half reversal with size increase
